# ULTIMA Calculator

A simple GUI calculator created by ULTIMA AI Agent.

## Features
- Basic arithmetic operations (+, -, ×, ÷)
- Percentage calculations
- Sign toggle (±)
- Clear function
- Modern GUI using tkinter

## Usage
```bash
python3 calculator_gui.py
```

## Requirements
- Python 3.x
- tkinter (usually included with Python)
